channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #WATCH | Hundreds of #food lovers from #Kerala and #Coimbato
item.description: #WATCH | Hundreds of #food lovers from #Kerala and #Coimbatore thronged the Boche Food Express train hotel to participate in the Chicken #Biryani contest. The management had announced that those who eat 6 plates of Biryani in 30 minutes could win Rs 1 lakh.

item.title: Mangala Muduli hails from a tribe that has the lowest #liter
item.description: Mangala Muduli hails from a tribe that has the lowest #literacy rate among all the 62 tribes of #Odisha.

item.title: Badminton legend #PrakashPadukone and wife Ujjala Padukone v
item.description: Badminton legend #PrakashPadukone and wife Ujjala Padukone visited Vidyarthi Bhavan
